labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The other user cannot reject the call, and is forced to accept it.
data.expected_result: The other user will be able to reject the call
data.short_description: Cannot Reject Call From Private Call if Person Has Removed You as a Friend
data.steps_to_repro: - Add someone as a friend - Send them a call - Remove the friendship or block the user
